profile_summary:
As a proficient Senior Rust Engineer with 8 years of extensive experience, I possess strong competencies in **Rust**, focusing on building secure and high-performance solutions that integrate cryptography and blockchain technologies. My background encompasses comprehensive knowledge in **gRPC**, database design, networking protocols, and cybersecurity best practices. I have successfully led the development of enterprise-grade applications within the healthcare and financial sectors, employing **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** frameworks to ensure seamless integration and performance.
I am well-versed in full-stack development utilizing frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, along with significant cloud experience using **Azure** and **AWS**. My experience in microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation has enabled me to create robust and secure applications compliant with standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Additionally, I have hands-on experience in machine learning pipelines and MLOps workflows, utilizing tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, enhancing my versatility in delivering comprehensive technical solutions.
